Text: Time to give a little back

What a surprise! I was at that concert when I was a schoolboy! And it was a great concert, much better than most bands in these times. And since I've always been a great fan of Ian's Tull...

Sound is - if not perfect - very good fpr an audience recording of the time. No problem to listen from beginning to end.

Thank you, GroĂ&#x;vĂ¤terchen Rufus!
